name: BartonellaBacilliformisInfectionTestsForBartonellaBacilliformisIgGOrTotalAntibodyInAClinicalSpecimenByAnyMethod
title: Bartonella bacilliformis infection (Tests for Bartonella bacilliformis IgG or Total Antibody in a clinical specimen by any method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Bartonella bacilliformis IgG or Total Antibody),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed),(Inclusion Criteria: Bartonella bacilliformis IgG or Total Antibody),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
